document_data.name: Ripplebark Pie
document_data.mainbody: '''Ripplebark pie''' was a variety of [[Duergar]] pie made using the flesh of unappetizing [[ripplebark]] [[fungi]].
document_data.Availability: As of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], expensive {{SI|2|lb|k|long=yes}} servings of ripplebark pie were sold by [[Gorstaf]], a rude duergar baker from the city of [[Gracklstugh]] in the [[Underdark]] in [[northwest Faer√ªn]]. Despite its exotic ingredients, ripplebark pies appeared to be quite ordinary and appetizing.
